name: adidas Z.N.E. Parley Primeknit Pants
description:
Slip on these pants after the game and relax in the afterglow of victory. Built with a bit of stretch, the cosy pants have a seamless design that feels smooth against your skin. They're made using yarn spun from plastic that's reclaimed from the shore before it reaches our oceans.

Good for the oceans
This product is created with yarn made in collaboration with Parley for the Oceans: Some of the yarn features Parley Ocean Plastic™, which is made from recycled waste intercepted from beaches and coastal communities before it reaches the ocean

Breathable comfort
Breathable, flexible adidas Primeknit for a seamless comfort and fit

Convenient details
Zip pockets give you a place for your phone and keys

name: Nemeziz Tango 18.3 Turf Boots
description: Crafted for the creator, these turf football boots have a unique bandage construction inspired by sports taping. Their elasticised bindings stretch in one direction, but lock out in the other. The result is a boot that delivers compressive support and complete flexibility to make game-changing moves.

name: Terrex Swift R2 GTX Shoes
description:
These trail running shoes combine a responsive midsole with an outdoor-specific frame to provide energy return and stability on mountain runs. A breathable, waterproof membrane keeps feet dry through wet weather. The Continental™ Rubber outsole, designed for a smooth running transition, gives you extraordinary grip.

Energised cushioning
Boost is our most responsive cushioning ever: The more energy you give, the more you get

Medial and lateral support
Pro-Moderator medial and lateral support puts extra stability in the midsole

name: Oversize Trefoil Tee
description:
The Trefoil has been making its mark since 1972. This t-shirt celebrates its legacy in soft cotton jersey and a modern, boxy shape. 

The Adicolor collection
Inspired by adidas heritage, Adicolor is authentic but modern

Iconic details
A bold Trefoil logo on the front shows adidas pride

name: NMD 7/8 Pants
description: Progressive, pioneering, premium. Made of soft cotton knit, these pants have a clean, minimalist look.

name: Belgium Away Jersey
description:
This junior boys' football jersey is styled after the away shirt of Belgium's multi-talented national team. Reflecting the colours of the Belgian flag, this sweat-wicking shirt has a woven badge on its chest.

adidas is dedicated to creating products in ways that minimise their environmental impact. This jersey is made with recycled polyester to save resources and decrease emissions.

name: Classic Backpack Medium
description: Fun, boxy and bright, this medium-size backpack shows off its adidas heritage with style. Made of nylon plain weave with a durable TPE backing, it has a main zip compartment with an inner divider plus an extra zip pocket in front.

name: EQT Curve Block Tee
description: With a technical design fine-tuned for different runner types, the adidas Equipment series redefined running gear in the '90s. This doubleknit t-shirt celebrates the Equipment legacy with '90s-influenced style for today's streets.

name: Predator 18.2 Firm Ground Boots
description: Reborn to rule the pitch, these firm ground football boots strap you in for all-out domination. The supportive mesh upper imitates your heel shape for secure lockdown, while a stretchy collar delivers a sock-like fit for ankle stability. A grippy textured coating helps keep the ball under your spell and the match under your control.

name: Trefoil Warm-Up Sweatshirt
description:
The bold archival colours of a 1983 adidas collection inspired the shades for this sweatshirt. It celebrates the Trefoil in slightly brushed French terry.

The Adicolor collection
Inspired by adidas heritage, Adicolor is authentic but modern

Iconic details
Trefoil logo graphic shows off adidas pride

name: Kaval Sweat Pants
description:
The Kaval collection is the new uniform for the street. These pants are made of thick, heavyweight cotton French terry. The fabric feels smooth on the outside, with a soft brushed surface on the inside.

Premium cotton
Soft brushed-back French terry fabric is made from premium cotton

Move with ease
Designed to support comfort and movement

name: Cutout Sweater
description: Shoulder cutouts give a sporty style a feminine touch. This sweatshirt is built with smooth doubleknit fabric for a heritage look and comfortable feel. Contrast 3-Stripes down the arms gives this sweater an authentic look.

name: NMD_R1 Shoes
description: Streamlined and modern, these NMD shoes combine '80s racing heritage with style cues taken from outdoor trail gear. The foot-hugging knit upper rides on a responsive cushioned midsole.

name: NMD_CS2 Primeknit Shoes
description: Inspired by the pioneering spirit of running designs from the mid-'80s, the NMD series celebrates a time when wearable technology was exciting and new. These shoes translate the retro-tech style for today's streets with a sleek slip-on design and embroidered details. The sock-like knit upper hugs the foot for a snug, supportive fit. Responsive cushioning adds all-day comfort.

name: NMD_R1 Shoes
description: Progressive, premium, pioneering. NMD blends pure adidas heritage with modern materials to create futuristic style that resonates on the streets. A sleek mesh upper combines with a responsive Boost midsole. Moulded plugs at the heel and forefoot add a technical, structured look.

name: Tango Layered Hoodie
description: This Tango hoodie offers a layered look. It combines a boxy outer layer with sleek contrast sleeves. It's made in French terry for a soft, comfortable feel.

name: Pureboost Go Shoes
description: Built for city running, these shoes are made with a light, flexible knit upper that adapts to your foot's natural movement. A wider forefoot and reinforced heel give you stability when taking curbs and corners. Responsive cushioning and a flexible outsole deliver a smooth and comfortable ride.

name: SST Track Pants
description:
The SST track suit was designed in 1979 for tennis training. It quickly became an iconic adidas street style. These track pants stay true to the original design with a slim fit and tapered legs. They're made in the original sporty polyester fabric that's smooth inside and out and just slightly stretchy.  

The Adicolor collection
Inspired by adidas heritage, Adicolor is authentic but modern

Iconic details
Signature 3-Stripes and a Trefoil logo show off adidas pride

name: Pureboost Shoes
description: With a sock-like fit and energised cushioning, these shoes are ready for city running. The light and airy knit upper offers a natural feel against your foot, while a responsive midsole and flexible outsole deliver a smooth ride.

name: BB Track Jacket
description:
adidas raids the archives to bring iconic looks to modern streets. This track jacket has a heritage design, modernised in soft velour. 

The Adicolor collection
Inspired by adidas heritage, Adicolor is authentic but modern

Iconic details
Signature 3-Stripes and a Trefoil logo show off adidas pride

name: NMD_R1 Shoes
description: Inspired by the pioneering spirit of running designs from the mid-'80s, the NMD series celebrates a time when wearable technology was exciting and new. These shoes translate the retro-tech style for today's streets with a modern knit upper. A handy clip for your keys adds a utilitarian detail.

name: X 18+ Firm Ground Boots
description: Sculpted for speed, these firm ground football boots are stripped down to the essentials. A low-cut collar, moulded heel and skin-tight fit lock your foot in, eliminating the need for laces. The minimal upper is coated in Skeletalweave, a grid of fine yarns for a direct touch. The outsole is perforated to cut weight, leaving you free to fly.

name: Milano 16 Socks 1 Pair
description: In football, every part of your gear is crucial, right down to the socks on your feet. Make a statement with these men's knee socks, featuring strategic cushioning and breathable mesh inserts.

name: Tubular Shadow Primeknit Shoes
description: When the Tubular series first dropped in the '90s, it was advanced for its time. These shoes take the heritage style in an edgy direction with a streamlined silhouette and bold details. Made with an ultra-lightweight, flexible adidas Primeknit, they have an innovative wraparound tongue construction for a snug and comfortable fit.

name: NMD_CS2 Primeknit Shoes
description: Inspired by the pioneering spirit of running designs from the mid-'80s, the NMD series celebrates a time when wearable technology was exciting and new. These shoes translate the retro-tech style for today's streets with a sleek slip-on design and embroidered details. The sock-like knit upper hugs the foot for a snug, supportive fit. Responsive cushioning adds all-day comfort.

name: Supernova Shorts
description:
These shorts are designed to help you stay cool on long runs in the heat. They're made of breathable, quick-drying fabric that allows air to circulate. The lightweight shorts are cut to follow the contours of the body for a semi-fitted feel. 

Keep cool
Climacool keeps you cool and dry in warm weather

All-around reflectivity
360 degrees of reflectivity helps you be seen

Sweat-proof pocket
Keep personal items close and dry

name: Tubular Shadow Shoes
description: In the '90s, the Tubular series disrupted running with a futuristic outsole based on car tyres. The Tubular Shadow translates this bold concept for today's streets. These shoes have lightweight knit upper with a fold-over tongue for a snug fit.

name: Pharrell Williams Tennis Hu Shoes
description:
An adidas Originals design collaboration with Pharrell Williams, these shoes show off sleek court lines and creative flair. They're made in a flexible knit upper that hugs the foot.

Designed in partnership with Pharrell Williams
Pharrell's sign-off at the heel and on the tongue add signature style

A creative twist
Detailed with coloured outsole inserts

Supportive knit upper
The sock-like construction hugs the foot

name: Heritage Polo Shirt
description: Inspired by rugby uniforms, this polo shirt brings durability and a classy collared look to skateboarding. Made from blended jersey fabric, this polo combines distinct colour contrasts with heritage adidas detailing. It features forearm overlays for added durability, split hems and a slight droptail hem for extra coverage.

name: Tubular Shadow Shoes
description: In the '90s, the Tubular series disrupted running with a futuristic outsole based on car tyres. The Tubular Shadow translates this bold concept for today's streets. These shoes have lightweight knit upper with a fold-over tongue for a snug fit.

name: Ultra Primeknit Parley Tank Top
description: This running tank top is made of seamless knit fabric that's breathable and has an ultra-smooth feel against your skin. The fitted tank has deep armholes and mesh ventilation to help make warm-weather workouts a breeze.

name: Terrex Swift R2 GTX Shoes
description:
These trail running shoes combine a responsive midsole with an outdoor-specific frame to provide energy return and stability on mountain runs. A breathable, waterproof membrane keeps feet dry through wet weather. The Continental™ Rubber outsole, designed for a smooth running transition, gives you extraordinary grip.

name: Oversize Trefoil Tee
description:
The Trefoil has been making its mark since its 1972 debut. Made of soft cotton jersey with a modern, boxy shape, this t-shirt celebrates its legacy.

The Adicolor collection
Inspired by adidas heritage, Adicolor is authentic but modern

Iconic details 
A Trefoil logo graphic shows off adidas pride

name: Tango Tee
description: A sport jersey look that comes with oversize attitude. This t-shirt shows off a big Tango logo that's printed to give a smooth, leather-like feel. The tee is made in soft, lightweight fabric.

name: Backpack
description: With a purposeful design, this backpack combines a streamlined look with a touch of adidas heritage. Built of durable polyurethane foam, this roomy pack has space for everything your day requires, from trainers to your laptop.

name: Tango Windbreaker
description: Take shelter from stormy weather in this hooded wind-defeating jacket. It's made in breathable, water-shedding fabric. Soft and lightweight, it has a handy front zip pouch to keep your essentials close.

name: Supernova Long Tights
description:
Run comfortably in the heat in these breathable running tights. They're made of quick-drying fabric, with mesh panels to keep air circulating as you move. Pre-shaped knees give you a natural range of motion, and a waist that's a bit higher in back provides a stay-put fit.

Strategic ventilation
Climacool keeps you cool and dry in warm weather

All-around reflectivity
360 degrees of reflectivity helps you be seen

Keep personal items close and dry

name: Nemeziz Messi 18.1 Firm Ground Boots
description: Crafted for the creator, these firm ground football boots have a unique bandage construction inspired by sports taping. Their elasticised bindings stretch in one direction, but lock out in the other. The result is a boot that delivers compressive support and complete flexibility to make game-changing moves.

name: Crazy BYW LVL x Pharrell Williams Shoes
description: Worn by legendary B-ball players, this '90s-era design featured a look so unconventional that it was called Crazy. Its descendant, the Crazy BYW, combines retro style with innovative cushioning. This bold Pharrell Williams version has a flexible, adaptive adidas Primeknit upper. Boost midsole pods give a comfortable, responsive feel. Inside is a Pharrell signature sockliner inspired by the ancient art of reflexology.

name: Pureboost Go Shoes
description: Built for city running, these shoes are made with a light, flexible knit upper that adapts to your foot's natural movement. A wider forefoot and reinforced heel give you stability when taking curbs and corners. Responsive cushioning and a flexible outsole deliver a smooth and comfortable ride.

name: Predator 18+ Firm Ground
description: Turn your vision into control and prove your dominance with every precise pass, every minute of the game. With Predator, you leave nothing to chance, you're the master of control. Keep the ball glued to your feet in these football boots, featuring a flexible adidas Primeknit upper and ultra-responsive Boost. Made to dominate on firm ground.

name: NMD_R1 Shoes
description: Stride out in a bold minimalist style. These NMD shoes bring a modern look to '80s racing heritage. The breathable mesh upper shows off an allover camouflage pattern that gives these streetwise trainers an urban explorer vibe. Boost cushioning offers a springy responsive feel.

name: Pharrell Williams SOLARHU NMD Shoes
description:
Pharrell's journey across the globe continues with SOLARHU. Inspired by the raw spirit and style of East Africa, these shoes have a vibrant adidas Primeknit textile upper with bold wording graphics. They are finished with a bright lug outsole. 

Hu by Pharrell Williams
Pharrell's Hu collection celebrates the hues of humanity

Minimalist knit
adidas Primeknit upper wraps the foot in adaptive support and ultralight comfort

Boost is our most responsive cushioning ever

name: Pureboost Shoes
description: With a sock-like fit and energised cushioning, these shoes are ready for city running. They have a light and airy knit upper for a natural feel against your foot. A responsive midsole and flexible outsole deliver a smooth ride.

name: Agravic Trail Running Tights
description: Stay warm on the trail in these tights. A wind-resistant overlay on the front blocks the wind for added warmth while the back allows your body to ventilate. The pre-shaped knees and built-in stretch ensure a natural range of motion for running, hiking or cross-country skiing. Ankle zips make them easy to pull on and off over shoes.

name: Nemeziz 18.3 Firm Ground Boots
description: Crafted for the creator, these football boots lock you in for match-turning agility. The flexible mesh upper delivers a soft, responsive touch. Underneath, a lightweight outsole provides a stable platform for explosive moves on firm ground.

name: Parley Swim Shorts
description:
The yarn in these swim shorts is spun from plastic that's reclaimed before it reaches the ocean. The woven shorts feature a wave-inspired print. An inner mesh brief adds comfort. 

Good for the oceans
This product is created with yarn made in collaboration with Parley for the Oceans: Some of the yarn features Parley Ocean Plastic™ which is made from recycled waste, intercepted from beaches and coastal communities before it reaches the ocean

Secure fit
A tie-cord elastic waist gives you a secure fit

name: Classic Backpack
description: A clean, classic expression of adidas heritage with all the functionality you need. Made of lightweight, woven polyester with contrast piping, this backpack has a roomy main compartment for books and larger items, plus a pocket in front for smaller essentials. An inside divider keeps everything organised.

name: Gosha FIFA World Cup Official Match Ball
description: Displaying an eye-catching Gosha Rubchinskiy design, this ball celebrates the Russian designer's homeland hosting the world's ultimate football tournament. It has a thermally bonded, seamless surface providing a predictable trajectory, assured touch and low water uptake. A butyl bladder keeps it inflated and ready for action.

name: Tennis Tee
description: In the '90s, adidas Equipment stood for pure performance. This t-shirt blends the best of retro Equipment style with a modern feel. Pinstripe-thin 3-Stripes create a pattern on this relaxed-fitting tee. It's made of breathable piqué fabric.

name: AOG001 Sunglasses
description: These sunglasses feature transparent temples that leave the core wire exposed, turning a structural element into a unique statement. Adjustable temple tips and interchangeable nose pads help you get the perfect fit. Trefoil logos on the temple and screw cap give these glasses a touch of adidas Originals style.

description: Train hard. Stay cool. These men's football training pants help you warm up without overheating. Featuring ventilated climacool® and mesh inserts for maximum breathability, they keep the air moving while you stay on the pitch. A slim fit promotes easy footwork.

name: adidas Z.N.E. Parley Primeknit Hoodie
description: This hoodie is geared for comfort and warmth. Featuring Parley Ocean Plastic™ yarn, it has a fully knit construction that's soft, seamless and slightly stretchy. Drop shoulders give you easy movement, and a high neck helps block out the chill.

name: Colombia Home Jersey
description:

Stay dry

name: Terrex Skychaser GTX Shoes
description: Get creative with your route in these men's trail running shoes. Pro-Moderator support and speed lacing are built for the path less travelled, and a GORE-TEX® lining seals out water when your route is wet. No matter your line, Boost energy return turbo charges every stride, while Continental™ Rubber offers extraordinary grip on rock and rough or wet ground.

name: Pureboost Shoes
description: With a sock-like fit and energised cushioning, these shoes are ready for city running. The light and airy knit upper offers a natural feel against your foot, while a responsive midsole and flexible outsole deliver a smooth ride.

name: Crazy BYW LVL x Pharrell Williams Shoes
description: Worn by legendary B-ball players, this '90s-era design featured a look so unconventional that it was called Crazy. Its descendant, the Crazy BYW, combines retro style with innovative cushioning. This bold Pharrell Williams version has a flexible, adaptive adidas Primeknit upper. Boost midsole pods give a comfortable, responsive feel. Inside is a Pharrell signature sockliner inspired by the ancient art of reflexology.

name: Pharrell Williams SOLARHU Tennis V2 Shoes
description:
Pharrell's journey across the globe continues with SOLARHU. Inspired by the raw spirit and style of East Africa, these shoes have a vivid adidas Primeknit textile upper with hits of bold colour. 

Hu by Pharrell Williams
Pharrell's Hu collection celebrates the hues of humanity

Minimalist knit
adidas Primeknit upper wraps the foot in adaptive support and ultralight comfort

Signature Pharrell sockliner 
Graphic inspired by the ancient art of reflexology
